title: Marathon Petroleum Corporation
description: Marathon Petroleum Corporation is distinguished by a compelling color scheme consisting of bold and vibrant tones: red ('Hex: #EE193A'), blue ('Hex: #14479E'), and white ('Hex: #FFFFFF'). These colors, specified in the company's branding and design standards, emphasize clarity and confidence, representing the corporation's dynamic presence in the energy sector. For detailed branding guidelines, refer to the brand's official documentation as prescribed in their identity standards.
